name: frames
tagline: A self-hosted framework for building simple dashboards and start pages
description: Frames is a simple self-hosted dashboard framework for presenting styled cards, metrics, and links. It allows users to create personalized start pages for servers or projects using a minimal config file.

features.title: Screenshot Management
features.description: Capture and organize screenshots in a web interface

features.title: Image Gallery
features.description: Browse screenshots in a structured gallery view

features.title: Tagging
features.description: Assign tags to screenshots for organization

features.title: Image Metadata
features.description: View capture time and image details

features.title: Search
features.description: Find screenshots using tags and text search

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the screenshot manager on your own servers
